DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . This clinical trial study efficacy safety three time day BIAsp-70 compare two time day BIAsp-30 subject type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Three Times Day BIAsp-70 Compared Two Times Day BIAsp-30 Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Subjects type 2 diabetes Current treatment use intermediateacting , longacting insulin ( include longacting insulin analogue ) premixed human insulin least 24 week HbA1c least 7.5 % 10.0 % Proliferative retinopathy maculopathy require acute treatment Impaired hepatic and/or renal function Cardiac diseases Uncontrolled hypertension Known hypoglycemia unawareness recurrent major hypoglycemia
